headline: These Stocks Are Moving the Most Today: Qualcomm, MP Materials, USA Rare Earth, Avidity, Newmont, Microsoft, GameStop, and More
summary: Qualcomm soars after introducing new artificial-intelligence servers meant to compete with Nvidia and AMD, while MP Materials falls as Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent says he expects China to defer its tightened export controls on rare-earth materials..

headline: Dow Futures Jump on Softer Inflation and Rate Cut Hopes
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Monday, Oct, 27 2025 US stock futures are climbing before the open as investors respond to signs of softer inflation and a dip in Treasury yields, fueling hopes that interest rate cuts could be on the horizon. Market sentiment is also getting a boost from progress on US-China trade talks and a surge in services activity. This is prompting many to weigh whether the economic recovery can build momentum even as consumer confidence shows signs of...
